## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                              | Type                                                             | Default       |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `color`    | `color`     | Badge color variant                                      | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'`   |
| `max`      | `max`       | Maximum value to display before showing "+" (e.g., "9+") | `number`                                                         | `99`          |
| `position` | `position`  | Position of the badge                                    | `"bottom-left" \| "bottom-right" \| "top-left" \| "top-right"`   | `'top-right'` |
| `pulse`    | `pulse`     | Pulse animation                                          | `boolean`                                                        | `false`       |
| `showZero` | `show-zero` | Show badge even when value is 0                          | `boolean`                                                        | `false`       |
| `size`     | `size`      | Badge size                                               | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                           | `'md'`        |
| `value`    | `value`     | Quantity value to display                                | `number`                                                         | `0`           |
